verses.text: \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H3212"\w*, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w* \w yet|strong="H5750"\w*, love \w a|strong="H3068"\w* woman beloved \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \add her \add*\w friend|strong="H7453"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w an|strong="H3068"\w* \w adulteress|strong="H5003"\w*, \w even|strong="H5750"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* loveth \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, though \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w turn|strong="H6437"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w other|strong="H5750"\w* gods, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* love cakes \w of|strong="H1121"\w* raisins.

So I \w bought|strong="H3739"\w* her \w to|strong="H3701"\w* me \w for|strong="H3701"\w* \w fifteen|strong="H2568"\w* \add pieces \add*\w of|strong="H2563"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* an \w homer|strong="H2563"\w* \w of|strong="H2563"\w* \w barley|strong="H8184"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* an \w half|strong="H3963"\w* \w homer|strong="H2563"\w* \w of|strong="H2563"\w* \w barley|strong="H8184"\w*:

\w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* said \w unto|strong="H3117"\w* \w her|strong="H1571"\w*, \w Thou|strong="H1961"\w* shalt \w abide|strong="H3427"\w* \w for|strong="H3427"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*; \w thou|strong="H1961"\w* shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w play|strong="H2181"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w thou|strong="H1961"\w* shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w any|strong="H1571"\w* manâ€™s wife: \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* toward thee.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w abide|strong="H3427"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w without|strong="H3427"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w without|strong="H3427"\w* \w prince|strong="H8269"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w without|strong="H3427"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w without|strong="H3427"\w* \w pillar|strong="H4676"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w without|strong="H3427"\w* ephod \w or|strong="H3117"\w* \w teraphim|strong="H8655"\w*.

afterward \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*; \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H7725"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w fear|strong="H6342"\w* \w unto|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w goodness|strong="H2898"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* latter \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.
